lead_paragraph: Masters champion Danny Willett said he was looking forward to the Rio Olympics next month and another chance to shine on the world golf stage.

headline.print_headline: Golf: Willett Looks for Another Chance to Shine, at Olympics
headline.main: Golf: Willett Looks for Another Chance to Shine, at Olympics
